pandoc 
  to: revealjs
  output-file: basdoc-site-example.html
  standalone: true
  wrap: none
  default-image-extension: png
  html-math-method:
    method: mathjax
    url: >-
      https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/mathjax/2.7.0/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS_HTML-full
  slide-level: 2
  css:
    - 'https://cdn.web.bas.ac.uk/bas-style-kit/0.6.1/css/bas-style-kit.min.css'
  
metadata
  link-citations: true
  width: 1050
  height: 700
  margin: 0.1
  center: false
  navigationMode: linear
  controlsLayout: edges
  controlsTutorial: false
  hash: true
  history: true
  hashOneBasedIndex: false
  fragmentInURL: false
  transition: none
  backgroundTransition: none
  pdfSeparateFragments: false
  lang: en
  auto-stretch: true
  theme: _extensions/antarctica/basdoc/custom.scss
  title-slide-attributes:
    data-background-image: 'https://nercacuk.sharepoint.com/sites/basdigitalwmod-communications/creative%20services%20assets/ppt_title_halley.jpg'
  title: Minimal Quarto RevealJS Theme
  subtitle: Mimicking Presentation Hub Guidance
  author: Thomas Zwagerman
  institute: British Antarctic Survey
  date: last-modified

Output created: docs\basdoc-site-example.html
